TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Nearly all buildings destroyed in %s1_city
[ICON_BULLET]All nations in the world suffer from the great depression. You suffer a loss of %d1%% of your national treasury.
[ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horseman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
[ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
[ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Hittites seek to plunder the riches of civilization.
[ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] in all your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
Use our advantage to immediately train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horsemen[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horsemen[COLOR_REVERT].

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] in all your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in all your various cities. [PARAGRAPH:1]The master smith is a religious man. An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion if and when the quest is completed successfully.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, if you lose control over %s2_city and the master smith, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] in all your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls the Great Wall.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
National Sports League[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your cultural advisors to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stadiums[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable sports leagues.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stadiums[COLOR_REVERT] in all your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Rennaisance Era without having met the conditions.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dynasticism[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], and %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT] units. A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] will be required to fuel the planes.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] to %d2 new cities. [PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if %d3 turns pass without achieving the objective.
The %s1_civ_adjective population is revolting against their tyrannic leader.
The population of %s2_city is revolting against their tyrannic leader!
They just need some time to calm down.
Send the military to kill the rebels.
Your soldiers inflicted heavy casualties among the rebels and the population.
The strong take from the weak. Thats how you rule, and thats how your warriors think. One of your soldiers claims the farm by the rule of force.
Let them plunder, what can we do?
The fighting led to heavy casualties.
Grant your soldier their own land.
Leave it to the courts.
Enough with this insolence! Execute him!
The %s1_civ_adjective tribe is suffering from an identity crisis.
The people of %s2_city don't really feel like they belong to your tribe anymore.
They are losing their cultural identity...
The %s1_civ_adjective are being led by a new, more competent leader.
It is time for your tribe to choose a new leader.
Our best hunter shall lead us!
We trust our most experienced soldier!
The wisest man is the best choice.
The %s1_civ_adjective priests demand new sources of marble.
Our priests demand more marble for their temples and shrines.
Forget it, we can't afford this nonsense.
Send a few explorers to make them happy.
Fund a large-scale expedition to search for marble. Look under every rock!
We have found a new source of marble!
Our missionary sparked faith while preaching at the local community.
They are working hard for their church - and our treasury.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if research Guilds without having met the conditions.

[PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], and %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT] units. A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] will be required to fuel the planes.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first.
